exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) <-> (exists x : A, f x = y /\\ In x l)" on hypothesis of type "(fix In (a : packet) (l : list packet) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) p (nwPackets net)".

original: intros net p Hin. unfold In in Hin. unfold deghost. simpl. apply in_map_iff in Hin. destruct Hin as [p_orig [Heq Hin]]. exists p_orig. split. - apply in_map. auto. - auto.
